params.name: live
params.description: Optional Live instance. If None, a new instance will be created using **kwargs.

params.name: log_model
params.description: Whether to use dvclive.Live.log_artifact() to log checkpoints created by Trainer. If set to True,the final checkpoint is logged at the end of training. If set to all, the entireTrainingArgumentss output_dir is logged at each checkpoint.
